description.en:
The benefits of a ZROCOR citizenship don't end with freedom and autonomy. Respect for ambition and hard work, regardless of race, colour, creed or lifestyle create a merit based economic system. Blockchain technology and the speed of the global network have created a never seen before opportunity for  like-minded individuals to build a nation with robust bad actor checks without the need of an elite caste.

The ZROCOR Entrepreneurial Constitution is synonymous with the blockchain. It will be hard-coded into the smart-contracts. Impossible to modify, amend, adjust. It will be the culmination of the poli-organizational human experience since it's documenting.
